title: Mirror of gesture
creator_credit: University of California, Los Angeles and Edward Cornachio
brief_description: Explores the relationships between two major artistic forms of India - sculpture and dance. Emphasises the artistic correspondences between the two media, but also demonstrates how effectively the rhythms of the dancer have been transformed into sculptural form.
